import sys

N, D = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

if N <= 2 * D:
    print(1)
else:
    print(2)

N, D = map(int, input().split())

# The minimum number of inspectors is the maximum number of trees that can be inspected by one inspector.
# This can be achieved by placing an inspector at the leftmost tree that can inspect the rightmost tree.
print(-(-N // (2 * D + 1)))
